mapper.insert: insert into hotel_out (ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, RETREAT_TIME, RETREAT_REASON, STATUS, ASK_TIME, AUDITOPINION, AUDITPERSON) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{retreatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{retreatReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{askTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditopinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update hotel_out set CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETREAT_TIME = #{retreatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RETREAT_REASON = #{retreatReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASK_TIME = #{askTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AUDITOPINION = #{auditopinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITPERSON = #{auditperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, RETREAT_TIME, RETREAT_REASON, STATUS, ASK_TIME, AUDITOPINION, AUDITPERSON from hotel_out where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
